alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Shoshone and east central Kootenai Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 315 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of Fourth Of July Pass, or 19 miles north of Pinehurst, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Magee Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
